name: Kanye Zone - Tribute
description:
Kanye Zone - TributeToo HOT for Google Play!

Love Kanye Zone? Angry, that you can't stop Kanye from getting into his zone on your android phone? Look no further! Stop Kanye from entering his zone in this new non-remake tribute!

Score points by keeping Kanye out of his zone!

Featuring:
  • New Gameplay Mechanics!
  • More Kanyes!!
  • Super Flux Zoning Algorithms!
  • ENDLESS GAMEPLAY!

Known Bugs:

  • Galaxy S7 Edge's speaker is incapable of playing the gameplay music. (Reason: unidentified ; Solution: Use headphones or external speaker.)
  • Score does not reset after starting a new game. (Reason: identified ; Solution: Use Restart the app.)
  • Super Kanye is probable unbeatable (lol)
